serialization.name: Dialog
serialization.description: Dialog box. (Set Modal property for a modal dialog).

strings.jsxtext:
Move this dialog about the window. Note that it will not overlap the menu bar or the taskbar. Additionally, since the Overflow property of the parent, paneMiddle, is set to Hidden", when the diialog violates the workspace, the workspace does not pick up scroll bars.

Maximize the dialog. You'll not that it expands to fill the size of the parent workspace.

Note the taskbar at the bottom of the screen has an icon representing the dialog. The dialog can be minimized and restored from this taskbar. There can be only one taskbar for a particular JSX namespace. All dialogs will find the taskbar, and create their own icons.

Last, note that the dialog cannot be dropped completely outside of the workspace. When dropped, it will be repositioned so that a small handle will remain.
